Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Relates to preventing certain elected officials from being a member of an agency; repealer
Summary: Relates to preventing certain elected officials from being a member of an agency.
LawCode: Amd ยง856, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to preventing certain elected officials from being a member of an agency; and to repeal subdivision 4 of section 856 of such law relating thereto
